attributes.action: Rename May Day Bank Holiday 'Ranieri Day' in recognition of Leicesters title win
attributes.background: Leicester City secured the Premier League title on May Day Bank holiday 2016, in recognition of this incredible, unlikely achievement May Day Bank Holiday should be renamed 'Claudio Ranieri day' in celebration of their manager who facilitated their extraordinary success.

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for naming days in this way.
